{{cpp/container/span/title|data}}
{{cpp/container/span/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++20|
constexpr pointer data() const noexcept;
}}

返回指向底层序列起始的指针。

===返回值===
{{box|{{rlpsi|/#data_}}}}

===示例===
{{example|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;span&gt;

int main()
{
    constexpr char str[] = "ABCDEF\n";
    
    const std::span sp{str};
    
    for (auto n{sp.size()}; n != 2; --n)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; sp.last(n).data();
}
|output=
ABCDEF
BCDEF
CDEF
DEF
EF
F
}}
